item.title: about me
item.description:
I’m a cyber security enthusiast focused on embedded security, automation, and critical systems and so many nerd stuff

Currently working with:

  • 🔐 Cybersecurity (with a focus on embedded and infrastructure)
  • ⚙️ Learning Rust and binary analysis tools

Certifications

  • ⬜ CompTIA Security+ (Planned)
  • ⬜ Google Cybersecurity Certificate (Planned)
  • ⬜ Linux Essentials (LPI) (Planned)
  • ⬜ CompTIA Network+ (Planned)
  • ⬜ ICS Cybersecurity (ISA/IEC 62443) (Planned)
  • ⬜ CSX Fundamentals (ISACA) (Planned)
